mapper.update: update grp set remark = #{remark}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select g.id, g.grp_name grpName, g.teacher_id teacherId, u.name teacherName, g.course_id courseId, c.course_name courseName, c.course_type courseType, g.remark, g.create_time createTime, g.update_time updateTime from grp g inner join user u on g.teacher_id = u.id left join course c on g.course_id = c.id where g.id = #{id}

select g.id, g.grp_name grpName, g.teacher_id teacherId, u.name teacherName, g.course_id courseId, c.course_name courseName, c.course_type courseType, g.remark, g.create_time createTime, g.update_time updateTime from grp g inner join user u on g.teacher_id = u.id left join course c on g.course_id = c.id
g.grp_name like concat('%',#{grpName},'%')
order by g.create_time desc

select id, grp_name grpName, course_id courseId, teacher_id teacherId, remark, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime from grp where grp_name = #{grpName} and course_id = #{courseId} and teacher_id = #{teacherId}

select g.id, g.grp_name grpName, g.teacher_id teacherId, g.course_id courseId, c.course_name courseName, c.course_type courseType, g.remark, g.create_time createTime, g.update_time updateTime from grp g left join course c on g.course_id = c.id where g.teacher_id = #{teacherId}
select g.id, g.grp_name grpName from grp_stu_mapping m inner join grp g on m.grp_id = g.id where m.student_id = #{studentId}
